title: Mobile Microlearning for Strengthening Executive Coaching and Learning Reflectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Organizational Management and Understanding of Learning Theories
context.additional_context: A course for educators and administrators in language education, emphasizing enhanced managerial coaching effectiveness through team and individual reflective practice.

learning_goals: Design team reflection activities to analyze the impact of managerial coaching on team learning
Systematize individual reflection processes to enhance self-directed learning abilities through managerial coaching
Operate a real-time feedback system utilizing team/personal reflection tools in mobile environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
